name: Harvest Moon GB
description: Harvest Moon GB (牧場物語GB, Bokujō Monogatari GB) is the second game in the Story of Seasons series of video games, and was developed by Victor Interactive Software. Harvest Moon GB is the first portable Harvest Moon game, developed for the Game Boy. A Game Boy Color version was released later under the name Harvest Moon GBC. The Game Boy Color version was later released on the 3DS Virtual Console in 2013.
